title: Manoharam Diamond Haar - Exquisite Grandeur for Your Special Occasions
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features high-quality
brilliant-cut Diamonds of VS clarity and a vivid Oval cut Ruby at the center. Meticulously hand-set stones to ensure maximum sparkle and durability.
features: This stunning Haar showcases a delicate floral design intricately studded with shimmering diamonds. The central pendant features a striking oval-cut ruby, surrounded by an elaborate diamond lattice. This lattice continues throughout the necklace adding a touch of traditional South Indian elegance. The pendant design exudes timeless sophistication, blending seamlessly with both traditional and modern attire.
colors: Predominantly Gold with sparkling white Diamonds and a captivating Red Ruby centerpiece.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A timeless piece suitable for Muhurtham ceremonies
or a Half-Saree function (Langa Voni/Pattu Pavadai). Also
ideal for adding a touch of grandeur to any festive event.
description: A captivating blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. The ruby adds a touch of vibrant color and symbolizes love and passion. A cherished heirloom to be passed down through generations. Handcrafted Hyderabadi Gold guarantees exceptional luster and finish.
